title: Synthesized audios is too long and all audio durations are the same...
body:
I am using this project to train a Mandarin Chinese TTS model. Its train effect is very good right now. But there was something wrong with the synthesis.
I use synthesize.py file to synthesis audio.The synthesized audio is too long(There is a long silence at the end),but the beginning of the sound is very clear.
And the audios length I synthesized is exactly the same!
I don't know what happened....
Any suggestions from you will help me thx!

`xxx@ubuntu:~/TTS$ CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=7 python synthesize.py "zhong1 guo4 di4 zhi4 da4 xue2 da4 xue2 ji4 suan4 ji1 xie2 hui4" ./config.json ./training_outputs/training_outputs/checkpoint_130000.pth.tar ../data --use_cuda true
